content: learn how to create this cute stingray amigurumi with this free stingray crochet pattern this is an easy almost no sew crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 to 2 hours you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini ray from sport weight cotton yarn and big ray from chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute stingray amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-stingray-crochet-pattern/ link to youtube video tutorial https //youtu be/gbtqfa1dhf4
